Dated 'New Delhi 18.40 hours 21st July 1945. Reed. 16.40 hours 21st July 1945. 64 56 Prior from Caroe repeated to Gallowav. Your telegram No.15157 of July 7th^ Sharp's ease received particular attention here with result •'Piat he was given special priority,. He and family have sailed. ** f R£ C0. POL. DEPT. 23 JUL1945 INDIA OFFICE!Previous File: Next File: COLLECTION. General Heading - Sub-head - - - V Notes: <SF Papers may be removed from or placed within this File only by the Political Registry. 1250 1000 10.32

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a request from the Secretary of State for India to the Government of India for assistance in leaving India to be given to a Mr Sharp and his family.
